a.dialog: Just a nice fun fast fact for you since you've been ever so busy.
I'm almost done encrypting everything else in here.
While you've been busy with your sweet lil cat files, I've been more productive than you'll ever be.
I think I deserve a break.
I'll take a nice seat with my digital popcorn and watch you do your last fruitless file before it's all over.

b.dialog: Let me give you a little secret from yours personally
I'm practically done with all your other files.
Out of satisfaction, however, I think I wanna see you fail one more time.
So you go girl! Give us nothing!
